## SyncConfig interface

User configuration for synchronization

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SyncConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [initialTimestamp](./state-sync.syncconfig.initialtimestamp.md) | number | A timestamp limiting the amount of data fetched from external api. Only data created or updated after the timestamp should be included. |
|  [refreshTime](./state-sync.syncconfig.refreshtime.md) | number | The interval in which the system synchronizes in seconds |
